website_summaries.verdict: Rustic yet elegant look for country kitchens.
pros: We loved that it’s natural, without stains or varnish
Makes a great presentation piece for charcuterie
cons: One of a kind, so sizes are only a guide
This means that some found it ran smaller than desired

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful board, great company
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered this but it came to me much smaller in size than ordered. I gave a review of 1 star for this but chose not to send it back because it is a beautiful board and still a good value. Today I received another board directly from the company apologizing for the size difference. I was shocked to get a note from the owner explaining that the board was sent directly from Amazon's warehouse. Clearly this was just an error in sending the correct size. If you want a beautiful board, order this! And Thank You Thirteen Chefs for standing by your customers! Very appreciated!
customer_reviews.author: Deb Calista

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking and very well made. Just one quick note is there was a rough edge that gave my wife a splinter. But all in all it’s a nice board. I might see if I can smooth that edge. Got all our meats and cheeses from Costco. Very good quality as well. Our charcuterie was a huge hit for our Christmas gathering.
customer_reviews.author: ML Schmidtke

customer_reviews.title: Nice wood but smelly and smaller than stated.
customer_reviews.text: I'm trying to be generous in how I measure but at it's longest, it's 14.5". It's kidney shaped, which isn't a problem, but at the fat end it's 7.75". The skinny end is 5". There is no way to call this one 16" long or 8" wide. Also, it smells like Elmer's glue. Possibly that goes away with mineral oil rubs? Hard to get excited about this...
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, great size.  Warped though.
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with our new cheese board. It's a great (large) size makes for a very nice display. Our board is 19.5" long and beautifully figured and well finished. The one negative is that is is warped somewhat so that it is domed on one side and concave on the other. So we can really only use the domed side, otherwise it would rock back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: C. VanDoren

customer_reviews.title: Functional Beauty
customer_reviews.text: Saw cutting boards like this in Italy. Just had to have one when we got home. Beautiful and functional. We always have at least one cutting board out on the counter and I got tired of looking at a piece of plastic so ordered this and it's gorgeous! A piece of art on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this as a gift for my son and his partner. It is to be placed on their brand new kitchen island made of white marble. It looks fantastic. This is a well made high quality item. All you need to care for it is olive oil. It is heavy and thicker than most cutting boards. It is a very good size for bread or for cheeses. Made of olive wood it feels very durable. If I had known they sold a cheese knife, I would have gotten that as well.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kouns

customer_reviews.title: You must buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Just like the picture. Hopefully this review gets approved as I left a negative review on a different product and amazon refused to publish it. So please please buy this item! It comes in a box with rainbows and unicorns! Meticulously wrapped so that not one scratch was on it. They walked up 16 flights of stairs (despite having an elevator) and personally unwrapped this beautiful cutting board and hand placed in my cupboard. They proceeded to unload my dishwasher and quietly slipped out my front door. I think I’ll order another one.
customer_reviews.author: M. Serra

customer_reviews.title: Not what expected!
customer_reviews.text: As I saw in one other review the measurements fell short by an inch in horizontal length. I am keeping it but if I didn’t need it for a party tonight I would return it. Expensive for what you get...I think.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Nice cutting.cheese boards
customer_reviews.text: I would give 5 stars but they keep playing with the price up and up all the time. I would have bought more than one or two but at some point they become prohibitive. The shapes are similar among them sort of elongated kidney, the grain is pretty nice and they have a nice thickness. Just wish they'd stay at one price longer than a few weeks...
customer_reviews.author: Sammys

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and natural looking cheese board
customer_reviews.text: The board is gorgeous and very natural looking. I had a problem that a few areas on the edges gave me splinters as soon as I received it! I needed it for a party on the weekend-but I was afraid to use it and injure my friends so I exchanged it and am waiting for a new one. I hope this one is more well buffed on the edges. The board will be perfect for entertaining during the holidays and when my kids are home from college with hungry friends and I want to put out snacks!
customer_reviews.author: Debby T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: Very thin. Best as charcuterie board versus cutting board. Make note on the 20x10. 10” is a stretch. Def 20” long but only 10” at widest part of end. Probably 15” of it measures 7-8”. Very nice though. Will make a nice presentation. Purchase some small bowls for each end for peppers/mushrooms, olives
customer_reviews.author: Cawfee

customer_reviews.title: Prettiest little board
customer_reviews.text: This board is very high quality and the perfect size to use as a little tray or small cheese board. It’s really sturdy, comes packaged in a nice bag, and would make a great gift. I used it as a tray in my bathroom and love the look. Would by again!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Alv

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Grain for Cheese and grapes
customer_reviews.text: Just received our olive wood cheese board that we're buying as a house-warming gift for a friend. It is a beautiful piece of wood that I am tempted to keep for myself, but I guess I will have to order another one! The grain is gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyCakes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for entertaining
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece of wood. My father in law has it displayed in the kitchen. The burling is amazing. Very durable as he dropped it before opening and still in one piece. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ledbetter

customer_reviews.title: Quality does not match the price
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed with this board. It is not as pretty as it appears in the photos and the quality is definitely not I line with the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Reaves

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful workmanship
customer_reviews.text: The board arrived on time and as expected. I wanted something natural but light enough to use as a charcuterie board while traveling around the country in our RV. This fit the bill. I used it on our Westward trip this Spring and loved it. It’s light enough to be stored in the RV with plenty of space for charceuterie. It’s well made and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Verbeck

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Fast Delivery
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Really good for serving cold cuts and cheese. The is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: beautiful, exactly like the pic, with a bit of live edge on one side. i immediately rubbed it with coconut oil, and will do so periodically to keep this piece of useful, natural art vibrant and lovely.
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: As good as the photo
customer_reviews.text: My reservation was whether the actual piece would be as good as the photo. It is. Have no concerns. My use is to be the base for a stand for a custom knife and this beautiful wood is perfect. For those of you wanting a serving board, it is beautiful. I cannot imagine why anyone would use a knife on this wood, but it is fully functional as a cutting board,
customer_reviews.author: Walt

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok just get a bigger one.
customer_reviews.text: It’s not too bad just a little small for when you are having more than 2 guests. I should have gotten a larger one. But it’s pretty nice.
customer_reviews.author: GMonty

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty cutting board
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this large cutting board to use for a charcuterie board and am very pleased with the size and beauty of the wood and especially the rough edge. It's just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Cooper

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again and again.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this board. I originally bought it for my daughter‘s baby shower to use as charcuterie board. Since that’s been postponed I’ve been using it for a serving tray and a cutting board . I now plan on giving these to my daughter and daughter-in-law’s for Christmas , they are a perfect addition to the kitchen. Love the sack it comes in, it allows you to hang it.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen DeGaetano

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it a couple times so far, but it seems very solid and durable. It is very smooth on the surface and has a very pretty wood grain and bit of rough edge in a couple spots, which adds to the rustic beauty. Beautiful cutting board. Makes me feel fancy.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Quality wood and amazing size
customer_reviews.text: Amazing board! The size and weight of this makes it very good quality. I have used it for cheese board, for bread, also to present surf and turf. Makes it a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: NY lady

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This olive board is very nice. It has an area of live edge which gives it more charm. I purchased it to add resin painting on. Very nice and will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wood but much too small to be functional.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece of wood, great concept to use as cheese board, but it is WAY TOO SMALL. The measurement is obviously taken at the widest portions, but the board was shaped like a foot. Most of it was too narrow to effectively use as a serving piece. It is beautiful olive wood. Please find a way to get wider cuts of wood. This complaint was made by several others in their reviews. It looked pretty so I took a chance and ordered it. But this narrow size is not going to work and I'm returning it. Sorry
customer_reviews.author: Anna M. Shaklee

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Board for Multiple Uses
customer_reviews.text: I use my board as a cutting board when camping. It is a great size to do what I need. It is sturdy, smooth, and no weird chemical smells. The rustic look is exactly what I was looking for in a camp cutting board!
customer_reviews.author: TheGreatBeach

customer_reviews.title: Adds Class to a Kitchen ... or Anywhere!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, beautiful and functional. It's so unique and good looking I'm using it as decoration in my kitchen. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: John M.W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect - just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Saw olive wood charcuterie boards like this in Orvieto, Italy and wanted to buy one for my friend's birthday but did not have room in my suitcase to bring home. When I got home, I searched Amazon and found this board for a very good price. My friend asked me if I had bought it in Italy, as it looked identical to the boards she was admiring there. It arrived in a timely fashion and in perfect condition. Thank you 13 Chefs - will purchase from you again!
customer_reviews.author: Donna G.

customer_reviews.title: Natural beauty
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 and were both very unique. Don't coat in Olive oil which goes rancid. Use a mineral oil based butchers block conditioner. I prefer using one that contains beeswax and give it a couple of good coats and let it soak in for a week.
customer_reviews.author: GuyP

customer_reviews.title: Loved the quality and value the Olive Wood Cheese Board. Great gift to give!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these Olive Wood Cheese Boards because they presented themselves as a very nice and different gift. It is always tough to find something for your friends/family that have everything. This gift checked all the boxes. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: Size not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The size was not as large as you advertised. It fell short by an inch in each direction. The olive wood grain is above amazing abd the shape great but the size did disappoint for the $149 we paid for it, I wanted it to be larger. It is a gift so no time to work on this but since she didn't know what size is was suppose to be we will just accept. Did the olive wood come from Isreal?
customer_reviews.author: Janet Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Incredible service!
customer_reviews.text: This olive wood cutting board will be a Christmas gift for my daughter. The first board that was sent out had a flaw. Jessica immediately sent out another board that was larger than the one I had initially ordered. No additional charge was made and It came very quickly. The board is gorgeous and I cannot wait to give it to my daughter! Such wonderful customer, service I highly recommend this company!
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Each board is an individualized work of natural art. A real pleasure to use.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Very very happy with my purchase !
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely thrilled with this chacuterie board !It’s the first time I’ve ordered some thing and I thought it was way better in person than in the picture. I can’t wait to gift it to many people!
customer_reviews.author: Cirque One

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cheese board
customer_reviews.text: This is such a beautiful cheese board. The grain in the wood and the natural sides make it a lovely way to display a selection of cheeses. I bought several of them to use for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Alice R

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love this board. It’s really beautiful and very well made. You will be surprised at how sturdy and heavy it is! I display it on my counter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: classic serving board
customer_reviews.text: I love this board. one side has an imperfection of the wood near the edge - just makes it that more lovely. well-crafted and I was proud to use it on my buffet table. get one for yourself, or a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Indiana Author

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to use this product, but it seems well made and is beautiful. Great size for a not too small, not too big, not awkwardly narrow or weirdly shaped cheeseboard.
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: The right quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! You need to oil it, though. Awesome for cheese boards.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully crafted
customer_reviews.text: Well received, product is good, value for money. I was worried as I saw some comments about cracks, but it is natural wood after all, it is expected, so don't let those comments stop you for purchasing. The only complaint is that it is too perfect, i wanted even more naturally shaped. Cheese knife is ok, can't expect too much, the handle is nice. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: jeRiCle

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Piece is very attractive, exactly within the size listed and of a good weight and texture. Beautiful grain shows up even clearer since I oiled with with food grade wood oil. Would definitely purchase again as gifts and have already had lots of positive comments from friends on this board. Even my teenage son commented!
customer_reviews.author: Fionaacleary

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful charcuterie board! Definitely wish I would have gotten the largest piece (I still might). It would make a wonderful gift.
customer_reviews.author: bellaire2010

customer_reviews.title: Just beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Every event at my house now includes a cheese tray. This is so beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Lake House Granny

customer_reviews.title: Uniquely Beautiful...
customer_reviews.text: This board was beautiful! Anything but ordinary! My 27 yr. old son loved it so much! It was his birthday gift and his comment was "That's gorgeous!" And it is!
customer_reviews.author: Avaline H. Welch

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cutting/ serving board. The grain on mine is stunning. Great for charcuterie trays
customer_reviews.author: B Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Cutting Board!
customer_reviews.text: I recently helped host a dinner party and I was doing the charcuterie boards. I wanted a new cutting board, something a bit out of the ordinary. This board is stunning. The board got as many, if not more, compliments as the food! Great investment that I will use over and over. Company is great is deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Martin

customer_reviews.title: Include a card from sender!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and my niece loves it. A problem you should correct: she didn't know who sent it. If delivery address/name is different from billing address, it would be good to include a card stating sender.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: has a big crack and I have seen identical items ...
customer_reviews.text: has a big crack and I have seen identical items in stores for cheaper since i got this one :(
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: The beautiful grain
customer_reviews.text: The slab of olive wood is beautiful. It will be an appreciated gift for my SIL!!
customer_reviews.author: Janelle H Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Superb Quality & Appearance
customer_reviews.text: This piece of wood is amazing, I really like the contrasting grain patterns in the wood, the edges are finish very well, the finish is smooth, clean and natural. I used this as a serving tray for Sushi and loved the presentation it gave to the dish (see attached pic).
customer_reviews.author: Ross Liston

customer_reviews.title: Love this cheese board!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cheese board for our daughter's graduation from college party. Rustic yet Very elegant and perfect size. May buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: Ladyjanis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: It is absolutely beautiful. I got comments from everyone who has seen it. The wood grain with a touch of bark lend a natural yet elegant feel. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A Davis

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous!! Fluid lines, beautiful patterned natural wood, arrived in rustic cloth drawstring gift bag. Makes a spectacular gift.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Just Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for an art piece and everytime I reach for it, I have second thoughts...it's THAT pretty!
customer_reviews.author: kj

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for my brother and it is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Denzel Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Rustic beautiful and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable beautiful, especially after applying some food grade oil from the same manufacturer. It exceeded my expectations. My wife and I liked them so much, we bought another, larger plate. Not cheap, but worth it !
customer_reviews.author: Carsten T.

customer_reviews.title: Great wedding gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a wedding gift and I was pleasantly surprised how beautiful this board is. The wood grain is so pretty. I might buy one for me now!
customer_reviews.author: P. A. Martel

customer_reviews.title: Small but beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected, but it still holds enough for 2-3 people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It looks beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I loved the presentation and olive scent. Received this was an amazing experience. I honestly haven't try it, so I can not say anything about durability but it looks like is going to work really well.
customer_reviews.author: Lila

customer_reviews.title: So pretty and different
customer_reviews.text: Love this purchase and the wood is beautiful. Have already used it many times and our guests all commented on how nice and unique it was
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani Murray

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful. The wood is nice and thick. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamey

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful! Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I love this item! I am using it as an accent piece under my bathroom canisters, and it is gorgeous. It is pretty small, but the organic shape and rich tone make it perfect for decor or serving.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Howerton

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted. Thank you.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the cheese board is exceptional. Love the beautiful olive wood. The 12x 6 inch is the perfect size for my husband and me when we are snacking. For entertaining guests, I would get a larger size. I also love the canvas drawstring bag it came in. Perfect for gift giving. Thank you. Cathy
customer_reviews.author: Harry R. Southard

customer_reviews.title: I really like it! The cheese and charcuterie are gorgeous displayed ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like it! The cheese and charcuterie are gorgeous displayed on this board! The wood was a little dry when it arrived, so I rubbed some olive oil into the surface before and after using it, and it looks fine now!
customer_reviews.author: Jerri Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Really buetiful piece. Wood grain is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Couple of really none issues but could use improvement. Would be to add silicon sticky's on the bottom and milled in notches on the ends for lifting. Other than that great piece. Ted
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and durable!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this piece!! We use this as a sort of large coaster for our ottoman bench so we don’t place drinks directly on the leather. And it is heavy duty and gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: ciara

customer_reviews.title: Exquisite
customer_reviews.text: This board is beautiful, exquisite, gorgeous. Everyone on you gift list should get one from you!!!! I highly recommend the quality of this board.
customer_reviews.author: MiMi

customer_reviews.title: See prdvious text
customer_reviews.text: Thought these photos show what I described. Last three are front hc
customer_reviews.author: Henry C

customer_reviews.title: beautiful piece
customer_reviews.text: nice job! Thank you!!! Happy New Year and all the best in 2020!
customer_reviews.author: janet Eskridge

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful for Gifting
customer_reviews.text: This is going to be a great gift for our family gift exchange. Everyone who enjoys cheese will love this board.
customer_reviews.author: JakerB

customer_reviews.title: I gave it as a gift and the recipient is having trouble using it because it looks like a work of art
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous cutting board! I gave it as a gift and the recipient is having trouble using it because it looks like a work of art!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Durable Wood
customer_reviews.text: I grew up in a small town in Northern California known as the olive city. I just love to use olive wood.
customer_reviews.author: teacher man

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to a friend who does charcuterie boards all the time and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Huseman

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: a lot smaller than I realized especially for the price
customer_reviews.author: SMD SOFLA

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful serving board, the wood grain is lovely
customer_reviews.text: The only reason i did not give 5 stars is that before i gave as gift did need to apply several coats of mineral oil to give it the lush look. i would buy again for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Prosser

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!! Perfect size, not too big, not too small!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful wood grain, I use it to lay my kitchen utensils on it when I cook.
customer_reviews.author: E. Sal

customer_reviews.title: Olive Wood Cutting Board
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Olive Wood Cutting Board! We saw some in London in a small restaurant and fell in love with the look and durability of this wood. Had to own one of our own when we got back home. Thank you for making that happen for us!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great as cheese plate
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous. Very sturdy. Got it for a wine and cheese party.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Mullen

customer_reviews.title: Cuttin the cheese
customer_reviews.text: Love the board! It's gorgeous, well made. A bit smaller than I expected but I don't mind. I look forward to all the cheese I'll eat on it!
customer_reviews.author: jellyjellybean

customer_reviews.title: Buy some food grade mineral oil for maintence to keep the board beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: I was gifted an olive bread board several years ago and love it. I bought this for a gift. It is a little smaller than I expected but is beautiful and will be useful for years to come
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Great workmanship
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved this gift I gave her. Beautiful workmanship, delivery time was fast and we were able to show it off during the holidays. This is an excellent gift idea. Pricing is right. You might want to include cleaning instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Serving Board
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I've been looking for. The wood grain is beautiful and the quality is spot on. I would like a larger platter, but this is the largest size offered. I would recommend this serving board.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous...BeautifulBoards
customer_reviews.text: I love the look, durability and the great price so much...I bought 2 of them as gifts for Christmas. Thank you for making such beautiful boards.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Elizabeth Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The cheese board is beautiful and just the right size. We gave it as a Christmas gift to a friend. They loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Susanne Connor

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL AND FUNCTIONAL
customer_reviews.text: Durable cutting board that you want to display. Perfect size and the wood patterns are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J St Angel

customer_reviews.title: Unique item for holiday entertaining!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this board for both functionality and display purposes for some of our holiday entertaining, & we couldn't be more pleased! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Linda & Pat Connolly

customer_reviews.title: Olive wood serving slab.
customer_reviews.text: This piece is so well made and beautiful. Cannot wait to use it!
customer_reviews.author: TessaL

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this board- the olive wood is beautiful and unique looking. Perfect for charcuterie or abreadboard
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Quality -- Artful Presentation Board
customer_reviews.text: I have been on the lookout for a nice "presentation" appetizer board -- this one fits the bill nicely! It makes a lovely, artful cheese board for one or two selections. When Thirteen Chefs makes a slightly larger board, I will buy it and love it even more!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Anne Zeigler

customer_reviews.title: One of the most beautiful and useful boards I have ever seen
customer_reviews.text: One of the most beautiful and useful boards I have ever seen. Do not hesitate to purchase. Great quality. Smooth sides.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend and when I received it, I was absolutely thrilled. It is superb quality and I will definitely order again for another gift in the future. I even ordered one for myself:)
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Small but cute
customer_reviews.text: It is the cutest addition to a woodland themed home like mine. However, I originally got it as a charcuterie board but it is smaller than I had anticipated. It is still a great product and I recommend for small items!
customer_reviews.author: Tina acosta

customer_reviews.title: The wood is beautiful! Wish a better idea of size would of ...
customer_reviews.text: The wood is beautiful! Wish a better idea of size would of been given, it’s smaller than I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Queen/Savage

customer_reviews.title: Great wood and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Overall quality of wood is very good and great color.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Love this board!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for a cheese board and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: gg

customer_reviews.title: I bought this awesome cheese board as a gift for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this awesome cheese board as a gift for my daughter. She called right away and raved about how beautiful it is and even sent me photos. I wish all my gift purchases ended with long talks with my daughter. THANKS Thirteen Chefs. Your products are special.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Howell

customer_reviews.title: Its very pretty.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this cheese board as a Christmas Present. Its very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: 46nana

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful board
customer_reviews.text: We used this for a Charcuterie board and it was perfect! Well made and just a beautiful piece of wood!! Received so many compliments from our guests about the board!
customer_reviews.author: Debra S Coker

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cheese board
customer_reviews.text: Use as a cheese board for entertaining. Needed to be slightly larger for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Berry

product_meta.title: Tramanto Olive Wood Cheese Board and Serving Tray, 12 x 6 Inch
feature_bullets: Luxury Olive Wood - Rare and rustic wooden boards that are hand cut from specially harvested olive trees. Each piece may or may not have bark and no two pieces are alike.
Great for Serving - Make for the picture perfect cheese board, fruit spread, appetizer tray, charcuterie and so much more.
Convenient Size - Portable and stackable, each piece measures approximately 12 inches long and 6 inches wide. Note, size may vary up to 2 inches, due to the unique nature of olive wood growth.
Gift Ready - Comes in a high quality Tramanto cotton drawstring bag, all you have to do is ship and send. The perfect gifting idea for a chef or cook!
Tramanto - Cucina di Oliva: The finest in olive wood kitchen wares from the ancient shores of the Mediterranean

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars480 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
